notes.title: Note
notes.item1: Applies only to cashback payments made from the 1st to the last day of each month (UTC).
notes.item2: Event rewards are calculated according to the cashback history for the month and are paid within 5 days after the end of the month.
notes.item3: This event is eligible to traders who have cashback history in that month.
notes.item4: Since each exchange processes it individually, you can receive rewards from more than one exchange.
notes.item5: The ranking criteria are based on each UID referred to the degenMax account in exchange.
notes.item6: This benefit may change at any time depending on our circumstances.
